alert.note: Alert for Northern Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 3:56PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tangipahoa and west central Washington Parishes through 430 PM CST... At 356 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wilmer, or 9 miles northeast of Amite, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amite, Amite City, Roseland, Wilmer and Tangipahoa. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 49 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
